storyContext.summary: Create an orchestrator agent that accepts queries via the backend API and returns a response using Agno execution patterns. Establish the core orchestration entrypoint for subsequent planning and retrieval work.

requirements.acceptanceCriteria: Expose an API endpoint that forwards queries to the orchestrator.
Return responses within the NFR1 target (<10s).
Use Agno agent patterns for execution.

constraints.constraint: Keep orchestration lightweight; no retrieval execution yet.
